mapper.select: select distinct * from product order by product_num desc

select DISTINCT productSize_size from PRODUCTSIZE order by case when productSize_size = 'SSS' then 1 when productSize_size = 'SS' then 2 when productSize_size = 'S' then 3 when productSize_size = 'M' then 4 when productSize_size = 'L' then 5 when productSize_size = 'XL' then 6 when productSize_size = 'XXL' then 7 end
select DISTINCT productEach_color from PRODUCTeach ORDER BY productEach_color asc

select DISTINCT * from(select ROWNUM r, z.* from(select DISTINCT selCount,pse.PRODUCTSELECT_NUM as pse_productSelect_num,pse.PRODUCTSELECT_NAME as pse_productSelect_name ,k.KIND_NUM as k_kind_num,k.KIND_NAME as k_kind_name,t.PRODUCT_NUM as p_product_num, t.PRODUCT_NAME as p_product_name,pi.PRODUCTINFO_PRICE as pi_PRODUCTINFO_price,pi.PRODUCTINFO_REC_DATE as pi_PRODUCTINFO_rec_date,pi.PRODUCTINFO_REG_DATE as pi_PRODUCTINFO_reg_date, pi.PRODUCTINFO_SALERATE as pi_PRODUCTINFO_salerate, pi.PRODUCTINFO_SEARCHWORD as pi_PRODUCTINFO_searchword,pi.PRODUCTINFO_BRAND as pi_PRODUCTINFO_brand,pc.PRODUCTPIC_PIC as pc_PRODUCTPIC_PIC, pe.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE as pe_productSize_size,pe.PRODUCTEACH_COLOR as pe_productEach_color,pe.PRODUCTEACH_EACH as pe_productEach_each from (select count(b.buy_num) selCount,p.PRODUCT_NUM,p.product_name from product p LEFT OUTER JOIN buy b ON b.product_num = p.PRODUCT_NUM group by p.PRODUCT_NUM, p.product_name) t ,PRODUCTINFO pi,PRODUCTPIC pc , PRODUCTKIND pk , PRODUCTSELECT pse ,kind k,productEach pe where t.product_num = pe.product_num and t.product_num = #{product_num} and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pe.PRODUCT_NUM and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pi.PRODUCT_NUM and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pe.PRODUCT_NUM and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pc.PRODUCT_NUM and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pk.PRODUCT_NUM and pse.PRODUCTSELECT_NUM = k.PRODUCTSELECT_NUM and pk.KIND_NUM = k.KIND_NUM ) z)order by case when pe_productSize_size = 'SSS' then 1 when pe_productSize_size = 'SS' then 2 when pe_productSize_size = 'S' then 3 when pe_productSize_size = 'M' then 4 when pe_productSize_size = 'L' then 5 when pe_productSize_size = 'XL' then 6 when pe_productSize_size = 'XXL' then 7 end,pe_productEach_color asc

select DISTINCT er.* from(select z.* from(select DISTINCT selCount,pse.PRODUCTSELECT_NUM as pse_productSelect_num,pse.PRODUCTSELECT_NAME as pse_productSelect_name ,k.KIND_NUM as k_kind_num,k.KIND_NAME as k_kind_name,t.PRODUCT_NUM as p_product_num, t.PRODUCT_NAME as p_product_name,pi.PRODUCTINFO_PRICE as pi_PRODUCTINFO_price,pi.PRODUCTINFO_REC_DATE as pi_PRODUCTINFO_rec_date,pi.PRODUCTINFO_REG_DATE as pi_PRODUCTINFO_reg_date, pi.PRODUCTINFO_SALERATE as pi_PRODUCTINFO_salerate, pi.PRODUCTINFO_SEARCHWORD as pi_PRODUCTINFO_searchword,pi.PRODUCTINFO_BRAND as pi_PRODUCTINFO_brand,pc.PRODUCTPIC_PIC as pc_PRODUCTPIC_PIC, pe.PRODUCTSIZE_SIZE as pe_productSize_size,pe.PRODUCTEACH_COLOR as pe_productEach_color,pe.PRODUCTEACH_EACH as pe_productEach_each from (select count(b.buy_num) selCount,p.PRODUCT_NUM,p.product_name from product p LEFT OUTER JOIN buy b ON b.product_num = p.PRODUCT_NUM group by p.PRODUCT_NUM, p.product_name) t ,PRODUCTINFO pi,PRODUCTPIC pc , PRODUCTKIND pk , PRODUCTSELECT pse ,kind k,productEach pe where t.product_num = pe.product_num and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pe.PRODUCT_NUM and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pi.PRODUCT_NUM and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pe.PRODUCT_NUM and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pc.PRODUCT_NUM and t.PRODUCT_NUM = pk.PRODUCT_NUM and pse.PRODUCTSELECT_NUM = k.PRODUCTSELECT_NUM and pk.KIND_NUM = k.KIND_NUM and pe.PRODUCTEACH_EACH = 0 ) z) er order by p_product_num desc,case when pe_productSize_size = 'SSS' then 1 when pe_productSize_size = 'SS' then 2 when pe_productSize_size = 'S' then 3 when pe_productSize_size = 'M' then 4 when pe_productSize_size = 'L' then 5 when pe_productSize_size = 'XL' then 6 when pe_productSize_size = 'XXL' then 7 end,pe_productEach_color asc
mapper.update:
update buyState set
buystate_expressNum = #{buyState_expressNum},
buystate_state = #{buyState_state},
buystate_state = #{buyState_state}+1,
buyState_result_date = sysdate where buy_num = #{buy_num}
update buyState set buystate_state = 4 where buystate_state = 3 and sysdate - buystate_result_date > 7
update productInfo set productInfo_rec_date = sysdate where product_num = #{product_num}
update productInfo set productInfo_rec_date = sysdate where product_num = #{product_num}
